lyrics:
55 contributorsapologize lyricsverse 1 ryan tedder

now its turning blue and you say
sorry like the angel
heaven let me think was you but im afraid
see onerepublic liveget tickets as low as 150you might also likechorus ryan tedder

whoaoohoh
